name: Animals (un)leashed
description:
Catch All animals in the level to win! 

Move with WASD and Move into animals to catch them

If you get stuck R to restart level

Made for GMTK 2021: Joined Together

This is our first Game Jam, We hope you enjoy the Game! 

The team: 

  • pastirma https://pastirma.itch.io/
  • Sytoplis https://sytoplis.itch.io/
  • Vava_the_blob on Instagram
  • @akurosoren https://soundcloud.com/akuro-soren/tracks
  • and Eylül 

OST: https://soundcloud.com/akuro-soren/sets/animals-unleashed-ost

psst if you get reeeally stuck try N ^^
